name: Western Redemption
description:
Story:

Play a woman cowboy in this parody western 3rd person shooter game. Player mission is to collect treasures and earn steam achievements and find major treasure in big map to finish journey. Player can use different weapons like revolver, shotgun,rifle and also knife and arms in melee combat. Player can collect more weapons but only 2 guns can be in sametime in inventory. Also player can collect boxes which contains ammos. Woman character also have grenades which are powerful weapon. Map also contains plants which gives player more health. There are checkpoint poles where player respawn after death.
Game include 3 different enemies, melee enemy with hands, enemy with knifes and most dangerous cowboy enemy with guns and grenades.
So be the only woman hero and find all treasures

Features:

- Open world
- enemies with rifle and knifes
- Steam achievements
- Health pick-ups
- Weapon pick ups
- Different weapons: Revolver, knife, shotgun, rifle

Planned updates:

-More Achievements and new areas
